product_name: Fizik Aliante Versus X K:ium Saddle - Men's
long_description: Lightly padded with a deep center channel for comfort, the 259g Fizik Aliante Versus X K:ium Bike Saddle offers a high-performance saddle to less-than-limber cyclists. Aliante Versus X K:ium offers support for cyclists with restricted flexibility-when bent over, one's hands hang just below knees and cannot touch toes. Synthetic Microtex cover is durable, water resistant and washable, and will not fade; plus, it's lighter than leather. Central channel spans the length of the saddle to offer a relief zone for sensitive tissues. Double-injected foam offers light padding for long days in the saddle. Nylon/carbon-reinforced shell provides lightweight support and comfort. K:ium alloy rails offer an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and comfort-enhancing vibration damping.
short_description: Lightly padded with a deep center channel for comfort, the 259g Fizik Aliante Versus X K:ium Bike Saddle offers a high-performance saddle to less-than-limber cyclists.
